TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ControlEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

Docs.summary: 提供 和 事件的資料。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAdded>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlRemoved>事件。 這個範例需要有兩個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>控制項都加入至表單，並連線到`addControl_Click`和`removeControl_Click`事件處理方法。
[!code-cpp[Control.ControlRemoved#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.ControlRemoved/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Control.ControlRemoved#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.ControlRemoved/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control.ControlRemoved#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.ControlRemoved/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Windows.Forms.Control control) cil managed
